cast.name: 达里娅·波鲁尼娜 Daria Polunina
西泽瑞·鲁卡斯瑟维克茨 Cezary Lukaszewicz
马特乌斯·戈尔斯基 Mateusz Górski
比尔特·比利托斯基 Piotr Pilitowski

introduction: A young mother disappears on the slopes of the sacred Ślęża mountain, leaving behind a pushchair with her baby. A police officer, a young husband and a retired clairvoyant try to reconstruct the last moments before she vanished. A female police officer with a personal childhood connection to Mount Ślęża stands in for the missing wife. "Clearing" is a micro road movie, a story about the role of women and the duties of motherhood, leading the protagonists either towards liberation or to self-destruction.
